Featured

067 - Angad B Sodhi: Storyteller, Artist and Curator building at the intersection of Art & Tech in Web3

00:00 00:00

Angad uses the power of art as a medium to break the taboo that mental health carries in India and globally. His art therapy sessions and workshops for corporates and blocked creative professionals increase creativity and communication…

Show Notes

Angad uses the power of art as a medium to break the taboo that mental health carries in India and globally. His art therapy sessions and workshops for corporates and blocked creative professionals increase creativity and communication skills. Shh... It's Taboo, his mental health event has enabled hundreds of people to share their mental health stories, empowering hundreds more to start talking about theirs. He co-founded The Colours of Change Foundation to spark conversations about locally relevant social issues in rural communities in India and to empower artists by the giving them a voice at the same time.

Connect with Angad:

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/angadbsodhi/
